title: Opinion: ‘Opening Weekend’ Missed that Jump-Off-The-Couch Moment
content:
Tour de Hoody: Headwinds, controlled dynamics, and a few misfires meant that 'Opening Weekend' didn't deliver the satisfying sparks it usually does.

Read the full article at Opinion: ‘Opening Weekend’ Missed that Jump-Off-The-Couch Moment on Velo.
author: ahood
